Comment.Language: The following response may be said instead:

Text.Language: Am/n a~m/n a~m/n: ]nah] ]nah] ]nah] je yai te qen oumeym/i: a~m/n.
Amen. Amen. Amen. I believe, I believe, I believe that this is true. Amen.

Twbh e~jen ,~rictianoc niben etqen mai niben: e~taujoc nan e~erpoumeui~ qen ]ekkl/cia: qen nen]ho nem nentwbh nem nenp~recbia.
Pray for all the Christians in every place, who said to us concerning them to remember them in the church, in our prayers, petitions, and supplications.

W V~nout pina/t a~non hwn nemwou a~ripenmeui~ qen peknai sa e~neh qen y~metouro n~niv/oui: I/cou <ricte bacileu /~mwn cwtem e~ron ouoh nai nan: a~m/n all/louia.
O God, the compassionate, remember us and them with Your mercy in Your heavenly kingdom for ever. O Jesus Christ our King, hear us and have mercy upon us. Amen. Alleluia.
